energyModal.title: Больше энергии от 50 до 100 ⚡
energyModal.description: Разблокируйте блог спонсора и получите возможность зарабатывать в 2 раза больше денег!

withdrawModal.title: Вывод средств
withdrawModal.error: Минимальный вывод от 1000 евро. Перейдите в раздел спонсор, чтобы заработать ещё больше!

detailsModal.text1: Investing is a way to allocate capital with the goal of potential growth over time. It involves placing funds into different assets such as financial markets, real estate, or innovative projects, depending on individual goals and risk tolerance.
detailsModal.text2: All investments carry a certain level of risk, which is why careful analysis and a balanced approach are important. Many investors focus on long-term strategies, diversification, and consistent evaluation rather than short-term results.
detailsModal.text3: Investing is a way to allocate capital with the goal of potential growth over time. It involves placing funds into different assets such as financial markets, real estate, or innovative projects, depending on individual goals and risk tolerance. detailsModal.text4: All investments carry a certain level of risk, which is why careful analysis and a balanced approach are important.

channelModal.title: Understanding Investment Fundamentals
channelModal.text1: Investing is a way to allocate capital with the goal of potential growth over time. It involves placing funds into different assets such as financial markets, real estate, or innovative projects, depending on individual goals and risk tolerance.
channelModal.text2: All investments carry a certain level of risk, which is why careful analysis and a balanced approach are important. Many investors focus on long-term strategies, diversification, and consistent evaluation rather than short-term results.
